<uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=dsiegel2275</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/d81c5ea3e4acae5e921ecdc62cb2eb2407e018fb66da74f432eb8c10ed4fda32/Simon-Initiative/oli-torus/pull/ 4614" 样式="宽度：220px； height: 110px;" />;<br />;将此建议添加到可作为单个提交应用的批处理中。此建议无效，因为未对代码进行任何更改。 <a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#a-bug-which-is-only-a-bug- Five-days-out-of-the-year" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39202916" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;XFaaS：Meta 的超大规模和低成本无服务器功能</stitle>; <id>;https://www.micahlerner.com/2024/01/23/xfaas -hyperscale-and-low-cost-serverless-functions-at-meta.html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T05:54:40.239045Z</更新>; <link href="https://www. micahlerner.com/2024/01/23/xfaas-hyperscale-and-low-cost-serverless-functions-at-meta.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;greghn</名称>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.micahlerner.com/assets/xfaas/figure3.png"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 114px;" />;<br />;功能即服务系统 (FaaS) 允许工程师运行代码，而无需为特定功能预留服务器。本文介绍了 Meta 的无服务器内部系统，称为 XFaaS，它运行超过 100,000 台服务器每天有数万亿次函数调用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#xfaas-hyperscale-and-low-cost-serverless-functions-at-meta" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39200239" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：ChatGPT 提示生成器 - 最简单的提示生成器</stitle>; <id>;https ://mitenmit.github.io/gpt/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T07:54:40.239461Z</更新>; <link href="https://mitenmit.github.io/gpt/" />; <author>; <name>;mitenmit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mitenmit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-chatgpt-prompt-builder-the-simplest-prompt-builder" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39201182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;日本将不再需要软盘来提交一些官方文件</stitle>; <id>;https://www.engadget.com/japan-will-no -longer-require-floppy-disks-for-submitting-some-official-documents-212048844.html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T12:54:40.239846Z</更新>; <link href="https: //www.engadget.com/japan-will-no-longer-require-floppy-disks-for-submitting-some-official-documents-212048844.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;thunderbong</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.yimg.com/ny/ api/res/1.2/0JF1pZ3WD6yglMu_ojpmCg--/YXBwaWQ9aGlnaGxhbmRlcjt3PTk2MDtoPTY3OA--/https://s.yimg.com/os/creatr-uploaded-images/2024-01/8a90e380-beea-11ee-b2ff-29e4c9725a4 7" 样式="宽度：220像素； height: 156px;" />;<br />;日本正在慢慢取消企业在某些官方文件中提交软盘和 CD-ROM 信息的要求。经济产业省 (METI) 是其中之一首先做出转变，不再要求企业根据34条条例提交软盘数据。但是，多个政府部门的约1,900个协议仍然需要使用软盘、CD-ROM甚至MiniDisc。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#japan-will-no-longer-require-floppy-disks-for-submitting-some-official-documents" target="_blank">;[摘要]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39203106" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;英特尔的谦逊</stitle>; <id>;https://stratechery.com/2024/intels-humbling/</id >; <更新>;2024-01-30T23:54:40.240248Z</更新>; <link href="https://stratechery.com/2024/intels-humbling/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jseliger</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jseliger</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/ stratechery.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/intel-humbling-1.png?resize=640%2C331&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 114px;" />;<br />;英特尔现任首席执行官帕特·基辛格 (Pat Gelsinger) 面临着挑战，因为该公司正在努力应对令人失望的预测和来自 AMD 的竞争。基辛格正在努力将英特尔转型为一家服务外部客户并重新获得工艺领先地位的代工厂及其 18A 流程。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#intel-s-humbling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=39197619" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;构建 USB 到 Mac ADB 键盘适配器</stitle>; <id>;https://paperstack.com/adb_usb_converter/</id>; <updated>;2024-01-31T06： 54:40.240634Z</更新>; <link href="https://paperstack.com/adb_usb_converter/"/>; <作者>; <name>;dcminter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=dcminter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://paperstack.com/img/adb_usb/keyboard.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 104px;" />;<br />;大约一年前，作者开始了一份在 Mac 上工作的新工作，他们并不特别喜欢 Mac。他们决定使用 QMK 项目构建一个 USB 到 Mac ADB 键盘适配器. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-usb-to-mac-adb-keyboard-adapter" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188954" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么自定义 GPT 比插件更好</stitle>; <link href =“https://mkremins.github.io/epitaph/”/>; <作者>; <名称>; throwup238 </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= throwup238</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#epitaph-fermi -paradox-simulator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39200182" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么飞虫会在人造光下聚集</stitle >; <id>;https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-024-44785-3</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T18:54:40.242539Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-024-44785-3"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.springernature.com/lw685/springer-static/image/art%3A10.1038%2Fs41467-024-44785 -3/MediaObjects/41467_2024_44785_Fig1_HTML.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 151px;" />;<br />;夜间活动的昆虫不会直接转向人造光，而是将它们的背部转向光线，产生垂直于光源的飞行。这种背部倾斜是解释为什么飞行昆虫最合理的模型在人造光处聚集。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-flying-insects-gather-at-artificial-light" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39192807" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;五角大楼试图隐瞒在没有授权的情况下购买美国人数据的事实</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wired.com /story/pentagon-data-purchases-wyden-letter/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T09:54:40.243315Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wired.com/story /pentagon-data-purchases-wyden-letter/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;RafelMri</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RafelMri</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.wired.com/photos/65b2db67795c1b0b2f34d23d/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/nsa-sec-GettyImages-1247909746.jpg" style="width: 220px ;高度：147px;" />;<br />;美国官员极力隐瞒美国间谍机构和私营公司之间通过手机追踪美国人行踪的安排细节。从美国手机获取位置数据通常需要搜查令，但警方和情报机构通常会向公司支付数据费用，从而有效地规避法庭。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-pentagon-tried-to-hide-that-it-bought-americans-data -without-a-warrant" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39201660" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Dynamouse：适用于 Mac 工作室的鼠标驱动程序< /stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/projectstorm/dynamouse</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T02:54:40.244076Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com /projectstorm/dynamouse"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kobieps</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kobieps</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/0095c145b062586aa69323bd271131a800c7f6c00525676316322bcf3dfc4cd9/projectstorm/dynamouse" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;复杂屏幕和外围工作站的 macOS 多鼠标和多外部显示分配。 - GitHub - projectstorm/dynamouse: 复杂屏幕的 macOS 多鼠标和多外部显示分配和外围工作站。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dynamouse-mouse-driver-for-mac-studios" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39189339" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;支票兑现业务</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/archive/the-business-of-check-cashing /</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T23:54:40.244454Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/archive/the-business-of-check-cashing/" />; <作者>; <名称>;admp</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=admp</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/content/images/size/w2000/2024/01/dalle-does-check-cashing.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了支票兑现的过程以及围绕它的另类金融世界。它解释了支票兑现业务如何存在来满足没有银行账户或银行服务不足的个人的需求，并强调了信用兑现支票涉及的风险。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-business-of-check-cashing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39197116" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;平方公里阵列原型“示波器实现第一束光</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2024/01/30/ ska_skampi_first_light/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T04:54:40.244834Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2024/01/30/ska_skampi_first_light/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;除霜</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=defrost</uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“https” ://regmedia.co.uk/2024/01/30/supplied_ska_skampi_first_light.jpg?x=648&y=324&infer_y=1" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;用于平方公里阵列的射电望远镜设计之一，称为SKAMPI，已经实现了第一束光。该望远镜由来自十个国家的团队设计，在中国建造。测试已进行在南非，该望远镜展示了其光谱和脉冲星能力。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#square-kilometre-array-prototype-scope-achieves-first-light" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188125" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;百老汇窗口系统</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.gtk。 org/gtk4/broadway.html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T22:54:40.245219Z</更新>; <link href="https://docs.gtk.org/gtk4/broadway.html"/ >; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://docs.gtk.org/gtk4/gtk-logo.svg”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;GDK Broadway 后端支持使用 HTML5 和 Web 套接字在 Web 浏览器中显示 GTK 应用程序。要以这种方式运行应用程序，请首先运行 Broadway 服务器 gtk-broadwayd， GTK 附带的：显示编号通过以下公式确定连接到 Broadway 应用程序时要使用的端口： <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-broadway-windowing-system" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39175112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN: Univerbal (YC W23) – 与对话式 AI 导师一起学习语言< /stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188760</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T13:54:40.245598Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188760"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Hadjimina</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Hadjimina</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;Univerbal 是一款人工智能语言学习应用程序，提供对话式人工智能导师。它旨在通过提供负担得起且易于使用的解决方案来解决昂贵且耗时的辅导问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-univerbal-yc-w23-language-learning-with-a-conversational-ai-tutor" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188760" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apple Vision Pro 评测</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/tech/apple- Vision-pro-review-39f2d82e</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T18:54:40.245978Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/tech/apple-vision-pro -review-39f2d82e"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fortran77</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fortran77</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;请启用 JS 并禁用任何广告拦截器 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-vision-pro-review" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39190468" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google 搜索从搜索结果中删除缓存链接</stitle>; <id>;https://www.seroundtable.com/google-search-drops- cache-link-from-search-results-36787.html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T01:54:40.246351Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.seroundtable.com/google -search-drops-cache-link-from-search-results-36787.html"/>; <author>; <name>;croes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=croes </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/images.seroundtable.com/google-robot-library-archives-1706180501.jpg"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 126px;" />;<br />;经过几个月的测试，Google 似乎已经从搜索结果页面中删除了缓存链接。我不再在搜索结果片段中看到指向 Google 缓存的链接，但并不意味着您无法访问缓存，您可以。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-search-drops-cache-link-from-search-results" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39198329" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Microsoft Edge 忽略用户意愿，未经许可从 Chrome 中获取标签页</stitle>; <id>;https ://www.theregister.com/2024/01/30/microsoft_edge_tabs/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T08:54:40.246727Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister .com/2024/01/30/microsoft_edge_tabs/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fauigerzigerk</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fauigerzigerk</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2024/01/30/shutterstock_edge_chrome.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;即使该功能被禁用，微软的 Edge 浏览器也会在未经许可的情况下导入打开的 Chrome 标签页和其他数据。这种情况至少从 2022 年中期就开始发生，并引发了用户的隐私问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-edge-ignores-user-wishes-slurps-tabs-from-chrome-without-permission" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39201317" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ISBL：在 Tcl 中实现的信息系统基本语言</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/jbroll/isbl </id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T06:54:40.247109Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/jbroll/isbl"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tosh</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39189252" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gitlab 的 ActivityPub架构蓝图</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/architecture/blueprints/activity_pub/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T08:54:40.247916Z</更新>; <link href="https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/architecture/blueprints/activity_pub/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;p4bl0</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=p4bl0</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;该提案的最终目标是使用 ActivityPub 将互操作性功能构建到 GitLab 中。这将允许跨实例合并请求和社交功能，使 GitLab更具社交性并扩大其受众。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gitlab-s-activitypub-architecture-blueprint" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=39187757" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Microsoft Edge 现在会在更新后从 Google Chrome 窃取您的数据</stitle>; <id>;https://9to5google.com/2024/01/30/microsoft-edge-chrome-data-update- windows/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T08:54:40.248657Z</更新>; <link href="https://9to5google.com/2024/01/30/microsoft-edge-chrome-data- update-windows/"/>; <author>; <name>;doener</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=doener</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://9to5google.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/google_chrome_microsoft_edge_1.jpg?quality=82&strip=all&w=1600" style="width: 220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;即使未经用户同意，Microsoft Edge 也会在 Windows 更新后自动从 Chrome 复制所有活动选项卡，从而积极窃取 Google Chrome 中打开的选项卡。此行为是通过导入数据的设置启用的每次启动浏览器时从 Chrome 到 Edge，Windows 更新后默认启用该功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-edge-now-steals-your-data-from-google -chrome-after-an-update" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39201224" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：开源x64 和 Arm GitHub 运行程序</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ubicloud.com/use-cases/github-actions</id>; <updated>;2024-01-30T16:54:40.249024Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.ubicloud.com/use-cases/github-actions"/>; <作者>; <name>;umur</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=umur</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-global.website-files.com/64f9d9b4e737e7b37d4e39a4/65282071b164fea224f6afa2_actions-image.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 203px;" />;<br />;Ubicloud 是一个开放、免费、可移植的云，作为云提供商的开放替代方案。它允许用户管理自己的虚拟机和运行器，并且可以轻松与 GitHub Actions 集成. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-open-source-x64-and-arm-github-runners" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39191870" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
